TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit MediaCommands extends System.Object
public ref class MediaCommands abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供媒体相关命令的标准集。

span.span: Provides a standard set of media related commands.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的命令类和另一部分中的命令命令库类，如和，用于表示一组的应用程序程序员经常遇到的常见命令。The commands in the class and commands in the other command library classes, such as and , are intended to represent a set of common commands that application programmers encounter frequently. 命令仅表示的实例不实现逻辑的命令。The commands only represent the instance of the and not the implementation logic for the command. 实现逻辑绑定到通过命令。The implementation logic is bound to the command via a . 例如，如果控件 （命令目标），后者将执行的逻辑上执行命令命令可能无法提供命令目标，因此应用程序编写器将负责编写逻辑确定如何对命令目标将处理该命令。For example, if the command is executed on a control (the command target), the logic which performs the command may not be provided by the command target, so the application writer will be responsible for writing the logic that determines how the command target will handle the command. 许多控件对于许多命令库中的命令提供实现逻辑。Many controls do provide implementation logic for many of the commands in the command library. 例如，类提供了逻辑命令，命令，命令，命令，和命令。For example, the class provides logic for the command, command, command, command, and command. 有关详细信息命令和命令，请参阅[命令概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md)。For more information on commands and commanding see the [Commanding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property BoostBass As RoutedUICommand
public: static property System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ BoostBass { System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取表示“提升基础”命令的值。

span.span: Gets the value that represents the Boost Base command.
The command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令指示打开或关闭低音增强的意图。This command indicates the intention to toggle the bass boost on or off. 并不一定对任何给定的对象; 上的命令的响应的实际实现在许多情况下对该命令的响应中的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。There is not necessarily an actual implementation responding to the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

public: static property System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ ChannelDown { System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取表示 Channel Down 命令的值。

span.span: Gets the value that represents the Channel Down command.
The command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令指示要递减的通道值的意图。This command indicates the intention to decrement the channel value. 并不一定对任何给定的对象; 上的命令的响应的实际实现在许多情况下对该命令的响应中的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。There is not necessarily an actual implementation responding to the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```
